resources.string: "0 Governor's Ave., Suite B3, Medford, MA 02155"

Our goal at Celebrity Sound and Light is to provide our clients with professional entertainment that will have them and their guests dancing the night away without a \"cheese factor\" or a DJ who feels the needs to be the center of attention. You might say that our gimmick is our professionalism. We don\'t draw attention to ourselves - we draw attention to the dance floor.

As one of Boston\'s premier DJ and lighting services, we are always committed to excellence. We are reliable, experienced, pleasing, and cooperative individuals with professional equipment and liability insurance; we have a level of personal service that makes our prices an excellent value.
